# fyi: rhydrogen

## Exported Functions (rhydrogen::)

| Function | Arguments |
|----------|-----------|
| `check` | path |
| `clean` | path, namespace |
| `document` | path, namespace |
| `install` | path, quiet |
| `load_all` | path, quiet |


## Internal Functions (rhydrogen:::)

| Function | Arguments |
|----------|-----------|
| `escape_rd` | text |
| `extract_formals` | code |
| `generate_all_rd` | blocks, path |
| `generate_namespace` | blocks |
| `generate_rd` | tags, formals |
| `parse_file` | file |
| `parse_formals_text` | text |
| `parse_object_definition` | text, file, line_num |
| `parse_package` | path |
| `parse_tags` | lines, object_name, file, line_num |
| `save_tag` | result, tag, arg, accumulator, file, line_num |
| `write_namespace` | content, path, mode |
| `write_rd` | content, name, path |


## Options

No options found in `rhydrogen`.



# Documentation: rhydrogen

## check

*Check Package Documentation*

```
_C_h_e_c_k _P_a_c_k_a_g_e _D_o_c_u_m_e_n_t_a_t_i_o_n

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Validates that Rd files and NAMESPACE are syntactically correct.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     check(path)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root directory.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     TRUE if all checks pass, FALSE otherwise.

_E_x_a_m_p_l_e_s:

     ## Not run:
     
     check()
     ## End(Not run)
     
```

## clean

*Clean Generated Files*

```
_C_l_e_a_n _G_e_n_e_r_a_t_e_d _F_i_l_e_s

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Removes all Rd files from man/ directory.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     clean(path, namespace)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root directory.

namespace: Also remove NAMESPACE? Default FALSE.

_E_x_a_m_p_l_e_s:

     ## Not run:
     
     clean()
     clean(namespace = TRUE)
     ## End(Not run)
     
```

## document

*Generate Documentation for an R Package*

```
_G_e_n_e_r_a_t_e _D_o_c_u_m_e_n_t_a_t_i_o_n _f_o_r _a_n _R _P_a_c_k_a_g_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Main function for rhydrogen. Parses R source files for
     documentation comments and generates Rd files and NAMESPACE.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     document(path, namespace)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root directory. Default is current directory.

namespace: How to handle NAMESPACE generation. One of: - "overwrite":
          Fully regenerate NAMESPACE (default) - "append": Insert
          between ## rhydrogen start/end markers - "none": Don't modify
          NAMESPACE

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Invisibly returns a list with: - rd_files: character vector of
     generated Rd file paths - namespace: path to NAMESPACE file (or
     NULL if mode="none")

_E_x_a_m_p_l_e_s:

     ## Not run:
     
     # Document current package
     document()
     
     # Document with append mode for NAMESPACE
     document(namespace = "append")
     
     # Document without modifying NAMESPACE
     document(namespace = "none")
     ## End(Not run)
     
```

## escape_rd

*Escape Special Characters for Rd*

```
_E_s_c_a_p_e _S_p_e_c_i_a_l _C_h_a_r_a_c_t_e_r_s _f_o_r _R_d

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Escape Special Characters for Rd

_U_s_a_g_e:

     escape_rd(text)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    text: Text to escape.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Escaped text.

```

## extract_formals

*Extract Function Formals from Code*

```
_E_x_t_r_a_c_t _F_u_n_c_t_i_o_n _F_o_r_m_a_l_s _f_r_o_m _C_o_d_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Extract Function Formals from Code

_U_s_a_g_e:

     extract_formals(code)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    code: Code starting with "function("

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character vector of formal argument names.

```

## generate_all_rd

*Generate All Rd Files for a Package*

```
_G_e_n_e_r_a_t_e _A_l_l _R_d _F_i_l_e_s _f_o_r _a _P_a_c_k_a_g_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Generate All Rd Files for a Package

_U_s_a_g_e:

     generate_all_rd(blocks, path)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

  blocks: List of documentation blocks from parse_package().

    path: Package root path.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character vector of generated file paths.

```

## generate_namespace

*Generate NAMESPACE Content*

```
_G_e_n_e_r_a_t_e _N_A_M_E_S_P_A_C_E _C_o_n_t_e_n_t

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Generate NAMESPACE Content

_U_s_a_g_e:

     generate_namespace(blocks)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

  blocks: List of documentation blocks from parse_package().

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character string of NAMESPACE content.

```

## generate_rd

*Generate Rd File Content*

```
_G_e_n_e_r_a_t_e _R_d _F_i_l_e _C_o_n_t_e_n_t

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Generate Rd File Content

_U_s_a_g_e:

     generate_rd(tags, formals)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    tags: Parsed tags from parse_tags().

 formals: Character vector of formal argument names (for functions).

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character string of Rd content.

```

## install

*Install Package*

```
_I_n_s_t_a_l_l _P_a_c_k_a_g_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Wrapper around R CMD INSTALL with quiet mode option.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     install(path, quiet)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root directory.

   quiet: Logical. Suppress output except errors? Default TRUE.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise (invisibly).

_E_x_a_m_p_l_e_s:

     ## Not run:
     
     install()
     install(quiet = FALSE)  # Show full output
     ## End(Not run)
     
```

## load_all

*Load All Package Code*

```
_L_o_a_d _A_l_l _P_a_c_k_a_g_e _C_o_d_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Sources all R files in a package for interactive development,
     without requiring a full install.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     load_all(path, quiet)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root directory.

   quiet: Logical. Suppress file sourcing messages? Default TRUE.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character vector of sourced files (invisibly).

_E_x_a_m_p_l_e_s:

     ## Not run:
     
     load_all()
     load_all(quiet = FALSE)  # Show each file being sourced
     ## End(Not run)
     
```

## parse_file

*Parse R Files for Documentation Blocks*

```
_P_a_r_s_e _R _F_i_l_e_s _f_o_r _D_o_c_u_m_e_n_t_a_t_i_o_n _B_l_o_c_k_s

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Extracts documentation comment blocks and their associated objects
     from R source files.

_U_s_a_g_e:

     parse_file(file)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    file: Path to an R source file.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     A list of documentation blocks, each with components: - lines:
     character vector of comment lines (without #') - object: name of
     the documented object - type: "function", "data", or "other" -
     formals: for functions, the formal arguments

```

## parse_formals_text

*Parse Formals Text*

```
_P_a_r_s_e _F_o_r_m_a_l_s _T_e_x_t

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Parse Formals Text

_U_s_a_g_e:

     parse_formals_text(text)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    text: Text containing function arguments.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     Character vector of argument names.

```

## parse_object_definition

*Parse Object Definition*

```
_P_a_r_s_e _O_b_j_e_c_t _D_e_f_i_n_i_t_i_o_n

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Identifies the object being defined from code text (may be
     multi-line).

_U_s_a_g_e:

     parse_object_definition(text, file, line_num)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    text: The code text (may span multiple lines).

    file: The source file (for error messages).

line_num: The line number (for error messages).

_V_a_l_u_e:

     A list with name, type, and formals, or NULL if not a definition.

```

## parse_package

*Parse All R Files in a Package*

```
_P_a_r_s_e _A_l_l _R _F_i_l_e_s _i_n _a _P_a_c_k_a_g_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Parse All R Files in a Package

_U_s_a_g_e:

     parse_package(path)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

    path: Path to package root.

_V_a_l_u_e:

     List of all documentation blocks from all R files.

```

## parse_tags

*Parse Tags from Documentation Lines*

```
_P_a_r_s_e _T_a_g_s _f_r_o_m _D_o_c_u_m_e_n_t_a_t_i_o_n _L_i_n_e_s

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Parse Tags from Documentation Lines

_U_s_a_g_e:

     parse_tags(lines, object_name, file, line_num)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

   lines: Character vector of documentation lines (without #').

object_name: Name of the documented object.

    file: Source file (for error messages).

line_num: Starting line number (for error messages).

_V_a_l_u_e:

     A list with parsed tag values.

```

*Save a Parsed Tag Value*

```
_S_a_v_e _a _P_a_r_s_e_d _T_a_g _V_a_l_u_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Save a Parsed Tag Value

_U_s_a_g_e:

     save_tag(result, tag, arg, accumulator, file, line_num)
     
```

_A_l_l _S_u_p_p_o_r_t_e_d _T_a_g_s

## write_namespace

*Write NAMESPACE File*

```
_W_r_i_t_e _N_A_M_E_S_P_A_C_E _F_i_l_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Write NAMESPACE File

_U_s_a_g_e:

     write_namespace(content, path, mode)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

 content: NAMESPACE content string.

    path: Package root path.

    mode: Either "overwrite" or "append".

```

## write_rd

*Write Rd File*

```
_W_r_i_t_e _R_d _F_i_l_e

_D_e_s_c_r_i_p_t_i_o_n:

     Write Rd File

_U_s_a_g_e:

     write_rd(content, name, path)
     
_A_r_g_u_m_e_n_t_s:

 content: Rd content string.

    name: Topic name.

    path: Package root path.

```
